items.title: Marvell’s stock falls in the wake of these two competitive concerns
items.description: There are new fears on Wall Street related to the future of Marvell’s work with Amazon and its potential to capitalize on opportunity with Microsoft.

items.title: The maid of honor approved my bridesmaid’s dress, but now wants me to buy a new one. What should I do?
items.description: “While I’d like to push back more, I know myself and will end up caving and buying a new dress.”

items.title: ‘I don’t have money to pay for a death certificate’: My sister refuses to probate my father’s estate. What can I do?
items.description: “I recently received paperwork from a company that my father had invested in.”

items.title: ‘I love my work’: I’m a 61-year-old Chicago public-school teacher with a $60K annual pension. Is it safe?
items.description: “I am aware that my pension as a Chicago public school teacher is dependent on factors that are very much in flux right now.”

items.title: My mother is selling my late father’s multimillion-dollar California real-estate portfolio — must I stand idly by?
